text:
Significantly improving cold starts
for Java-based serverless applications 
can be complicated, costly or both.

But a new feature is transforming
performance optimization

With Lambda SnapStart, your Java-based functions
can start up to ten times faster

with typically no changes to your function code 
or runtime, at no extra cost.

This innovative performance
optimization feature initializes

your function ahead of time, 
takes a Firecracker VM snapshot, and caches it

it resumes execution from the snapshot
rather than initializing from scratch,

reducing latency and significantly
improving cold start performance.
You can enable Lambda SnapStart for new or existing

Java-based serverless applications
such as microservices, synchronous APIs, 
and interactive applications.

Optimize performance for Java-based
serverless applications with AWS Lambda SnapStart.
